job_history.work_description: Acquiring and retaining a portfolio of commercial banking clients with annual revenue of 2 million to 20 million. Conducting relationship review meetings, developing customized client strategies, and ensuring attainment of loan, deposit, revenue and new households.

Advising military and Department of Defense civilians of their entitlement for shipment of personal property and passenger travel. Preparing the necessary documentation and coordinating transport capability to meet a movement mission.
Covering a district size area over all small business commercial lending and relationship needs. Meeting and exceeding all assigned sales goals through outside sales and other activities.
Opening a state of the art Wellness and Fitness Center for the Chase Park Plaza and developing management strategies to coincide with the consultant group and current hotel staff.
Managing multiple 35000 square foot fitness centers with over 35 employees. Managing payroll, scheduling, training for each department, and setting budgets for the sales team.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in leadership roles, including managing multiple teams, developing strategies, and exceeding sales goals, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Management
skills.explanation: Has managed multiple fitness centers, supervised employees, and handled payroll, scheduling, and training, showing expert-level proficiency in management.

skills.name: Sales
skills.explanation: Has consistently met and exceeded sales goals in various roles, including commercial banking and fitness center management, indicating strong proficiency in sales.

skills.name: Client Relationship Management
skills.explanation: Has developed and maintained relationships with commercial banking clients, and has conducted relationship review meetings, suggesting strong proficiency in client relationship management.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Has set budgets for sales teams and managed financial aspects of fitness centers, showing a solid working proficiency in budgeting.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Has managed payroll for multiple employees, indicating a solid working proficiency in payroll management.

skills.name: Strategic Planning
skills.explanation: Has developed management strategies and customized client strategies, showing a solid working proficiency in strategic planning.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has advised military and Department of Defense civilians, and has conducted relationship review meetings, indicating a solid working proficiency in communication.
